title: RITO MAKING ME AFK
body: for a little while now, ive been dealing with a issue. My keyboard will just stop working, all buttons, no way to tell anyone whats going on. and have had to finish games with just my mouse. sooo i stopped playing for a week or so, downloaded some stuff, played some other games that i can just stop playing if it happens again...everything stopped, played some mmo's, no issues....2nd game into LoL. keyboard stops working.....get a leave buster warning..... cool.

replies.body: That's a really strange issue, and I wonder if there's an issue with your keyboard or any drivers/programs used for it.  Are able able to swap your keyboard to see rule out possibilities of hardware issues with it?  Let me know.

i am not able to swap it out. or at least i'd have to learn how to swap out a laptop keyboard. All i know is that it is Leauge that causes the issue, or it will only happen once i have opened Leauge. i have updated my drivers, but it still happens. and i have to power cycle and try to get back in fast.  i still normally get reported. its not like every game. sometimes, it happens immediate, sometimes i can play all day before it happens. but if i dont open Leauge it never happens.
also i went back to the old client, and the issue seems to have stopped.
